title: benjmestrallet
author: benjmestrallet
content: Meeds strives to be the standard measure of engagement, usable by any organization grappling with disengagement issues and seeking to take action. Our goal is to create a worldwide system that is accessible to all. Through the Meeds Hubs, any organization can offer incentives to its contributors. To provide access to the Meeds software, we have created the WoM, a decentralized platform.To learn more about Meeds and Deed here are a couple of articles that explain the Work Metaverse whitepaperPart 1: How To Improve Engagement at Work with Meeds Tokenhttps://medium.com/meeds-dao/how-to-improve-engagement-at-work-with-meeds-token-43d818d4c2d6Part 2: Deeds: The Cornerstone of Meeds Work Metaversehttps://medium.com/meeds-dao/deeds-the-cornerstone-of-the-meeds-work-metaverse-567adb6d3875Part 3: Breaking the Mold: Meedsâ€™ Open and Decentralized Approach to Subscription Modelshttps://medium.com/meeds-dao/breaking-the-mold-meeds-open-and-decentralized-approach-to-subscription-models-b55ff0acdca9
